Story.Name: iaf_ZhenInvasion
Story.Desc: [NAME] went into the Pagoda. A large amount of Arrays can be seen.

li.OKResult: me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME] went to inspect the green Array. Unfortunately their understanding was too low, and they triggered a trap. Enemies have appeared.")); ZhenInvasion.CallInvasionLevel(1);
me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME] went to inspect the blue Array. Unfortunately their understanding was too low, and they triggered a trap. Enemies have appeared.")); ZhenInvasion.CallInvasionLevel(2);
me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME] went to inspect the purple Array. Unfortunately their understanding was too low, and they triggered a trap. Enemies have appeared.")); ZhenInvasion.CallInvasionLevel(3);
me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME] went to inspect the orange Array. Unfortunately their understanding was too low, and they triggered a trap. Enemies have appeared.")); ZhenInvasion.CallInvasionLevel(4);
me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME] went to inspect the basic pink Array. Unfortunately their understanding was too low, and they triggered a trap. Enemies have appeared.")); ZhenInvasion.CallInvasionLevel(5);
me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME] decided to ignore the Arrays and left the Pagoda."));
